title: About Us
description: Meet the team behind Jamaleddin—engineers and strategists passionate about building exceptional software.

blocks.title: Who We Are
blocks.subtitle: A software company built on precision, creativity, and relentless execution

blocks.heading: Our Story
blocks.content:
Jamaleddin was founded on a simple belief: great software should be accessible to businesses of all sizes. We saw too many companies struggling with outdated systems, cookie-cutter solutions, and technology that didn't fit their needs.

So we built something different—a team that combines deep technical expertise with real business understanding. We don't just deliver code; we deliver solutions that move the needle.

blocks.heading: Our Expertise
blocks.subheading: What we bring to every project

cards.title: AI & Machine Learning
cards.description: From intelligent chatbots to complex RAG systems, we build AI that actually works in production.

cards.title: Full-Stack Development
cards.description: Modern web and mobile applications built with scalable architectures and clean code.

cards.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cards.description: Robust deployment strategies, DevOps practices, and infrastructure that scales.

cards.title: Strategic Consulting
cards.description: Technology roadmaps and digital strategy aligned with your business goals.

blocks.heading: How We Work
blocks.content:
Discovery: We start by understanding your business, your users, and your goals. No assumptions—just deep listening.

Architecture: Before writing a single line of code, we design systems that are built to last and scale.

Execution: Iterative development with constant communication. You're never in the dark about progress.

Launch & Beyond: We don't disappear after deployment. Ongoing support and optimization are part of the package.

members.name: Ammar Jamaleddin
members.bio: Ammar brings a unique blend of corporate experience (Bosch USA) and entrepreneurial drive (Goldman Sachs 10KSB graduate). He ensures every project aligns with real business outcomes, not just technical specs.

members.name: Abdul Aziz Jamal Eddin
members.bio: A University of Michigan Computer Science graduate with experience at leading tech companies. AZ specializes in AI systems, platform architecture, and turning complex requirements into elegant solutions.

blocks.heading: Ready to Start?
blocks.text: Whether you have a detailed spec or just a rough idea, we're here to help bring it to life. Let's talk.
